data.eml:eml: Landschap Noord-Holland was established in 1936 and has grown into a goal-oriented and dynamic organisation. It maintains and develops nature, landscape and cultural heritage in Noord-Holland. It does so in the 96 areas in their ownership, with a size of 4,448 ha. In addition, the organisation manages landscapes for other parties, such as municipalities, water boards and the provincial department.Positive observations without protocolDataset available via https://www.ndff.nl/english / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nl8,116 records (March 2018)
